revision.comment: /* Charity work */changed to the right name per website
revision.text:
{{pp|small=yes}} {{Use mdy dates|date=July 2014}} {{Infobox person | image = Misha Collins by Gage Skidmore 4.jpg | caption = Collins at the 2017 Comic Con in San Diego | name = Misha Collins | birth_name = Dmitri Tippens Krushnic | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1974|8|20}} | birth_place = [[Boston]], [[Massachusetts]], U.S. | occupation = Actor | yearsactive = 1998–present | alma_mater = [[Northfield Mount Hermon School]]
[[University of Chicago]] | spouse = {{Marriage|Victoria Vantoch|2001}} | children = 2 }} '''Dmitri''' "'''Misha'''" '''Collins'''{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3hcx9pSnlzQ|title=Misha Collins in LA 09: On his name|author=|date=|work=YouTube}} "My mom went to Russia when she was in college, and […] she had a boyfriend whose name was Mitya, which she thought was the same as Misha, which it's not. And his real name was Dmitri, so my real name, actually—my birth certificate says Dmitri. But she always calls me Misha, so I have the wrong nickname. But, you know, too late to change it now." (born '''Dmitri Tippens Krushnic'''; August 20, 1974) is an American actor, best known for his role as the [[angel]] [[Castiel (Supernatural)|Castiel]] on the [[The CW Television Network|CW]] television series ''[[Supernatural (U.S. TV series)|Supernatural]]'' (2008–present). ==Personal life== Misha Collins was born in [[Boston]], [[Massachusetts]], to Richard Krushnic{{cn|date=October 2016}} and Rebecca Tippens.{{cite web|title=Misha Collins|url=http://www.tvguide.com/celebrities/misha-collins/bio/259304|website=[[TV Guide]]|publisher=CBS Interactive|accessdate=July 11, 2014}} He was raised in an irreligious family.{{cite web|date=November 18, 2008|title=Misha Collins is Supernatural's Dark Angel|url=http://screenertv.com/news-features/misha-collins-is-supernaturals-dark-angel/|website=[[Screener (website)|Screener]]|publisher=|accessdate=January 17, 2018|author=O'Hare, Kate}} He has said that his surname, Krushnic, "goes back six generations in Canada, and we're not sure where they came from."{{cite web|url=http://www.everyjoe.com/2008/09/24/entertainment/misha-collins-answers-our-top-3-qs/|title=Misha Collins Answers Our Top 3 Q's – EveryJoe|author=|date=|work=EveryJoe}} "My mother went to Russia when she was in college. She had a boyfriend named Misha, and much to my father's chagrin she named me after him. And the last name, Krushnic, goes back six generations in Canada, and we're not sure where they came from—could be Russian or Ukrainian or Polish." His stage name, Collins, is his great-grandmother's maiden name.{{citation needed|date=March 2016}} Before acting, he interned for four months at the White House during the Clinton Administration in the Office of Presidential Personnel.{{cite web |url=http://www.cwtv.com/shows/supernatural/cast/misha-collins |title= Supernatural Cast Bios Misha Collins |publisher= The CW |accessdate=May 5, 2011}}{{cite news|last1=Krushnic|first1=Dmitri|title=Lewinsky wasn't the only infatuated intern|url=http://articles.baltimoresun.com/1998-01-29/news/1998029053_1_white-house-lewinsky-house-interns|accessdate=July 11, 2014|work=[[Baltimore Sun]]|date=January 29, 1998}} Collins attended [[Greenfield Center School]], [[Northfield Mount Hermon School]] and the [[University of Chicago]], where he studied [[social theory]].{{cite news|title=Just try to find a stranger scavenger hunt than this|url=http://www.recorder.com/home/8080850-95/just-try-to-find-a-stranger-scavenger-hunt-than-this|accessdate=July 11, 2014|work=[[The Recorder (Massachusetts newspaper)|The Recorder]]|date=August 16, 2013|quote=GISHWHES was created by American actor Misha Collins, who attended Greenfield Center School and graduated from Northfield Mount Hermon School in 1992.}}{{cite news|last1=Hale|first1=Mike|title=Eternal Life, Thanks to Angels and Abs|url=https://www.nytimes.com/2014/04/20/arts/television/secrets-to-the-long-life-of-supernatural.html|accessdate=July 11, 2014|work=[[The New York Times]]|date=April 18, 2014}} On October 6, 2001, Collins married Victoria Vantoch, in [[Maine]]. They have a son, West Anaximander Collins (born September 23, 2010), and a daughter, Maison Marie Collins (born September 25, 2012).{{cite web|url=http://www.seattlepi.com/entertainment/tv/tvguide/article/Supernatural-s-Misha-Collins-Wife-Have-a-Baby-3902611.php|accessdate=October 5, 2012|title=Supernatural's Misha Collins, Wife Have a Baby|first=Liz|last=Raftery|publisher=[[TV Guide|TV GUIDE]]|date=September 28, 2012}}{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/mishacollins/status/251774579796758528|title=We got this on tuesday. No...|accessdate=October 5, 2012|date=September 28, 2012}}{{cite web|url=http://www.celebritybabyscoop.com/2012/10/21/misha-collins-reveals-his-daughters-name |title=Misha Collins Reveals His Daughter's Name |publisher=Celebritybabyscoop.com |date=October 21, 2012 |accessdate=November 8, 2012}} Collins is a published poet. His poems, including "Baby Pants" and "Old Bones" can be found in the 2008 edition of ''Columbia Poetry Review'' #21. ==Charity work== Collins is the co-founder and board president of Random Acts,{{cite web|url=http://www.randomacts.org/about/staff/|title=Random Acts – Our Staff|author=|date=|work=Random Acts}} a non-profit organization dedicated to funding and inspiring acts of kindness around the world.{{cite web|url=http://www.randomacts.org/about/|title=Random Acts – Non-profit dedicated to acts of kindness worldwide|author=|date=|work=Random Acts|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150227091740/http://www.randomacts.org/about/|archivedate=February 27, 2015|df=mdy-all}} Collins founded the [[GISHWHES|Greatest International Scavenger Hunt the World Has Ever Seen]] (GISHWHES) in 2011.{{cite news|last=Mandy|first=Chaos|title=GISHWHES – International Scavenger Hunt|url=https://www.wired.com/geekmom/2012/10/gishwhes/|accessdate=October 22, 2013|newspaper=[[Wired (magazine)|Wired]]|date=October 11, 2012}} Entrance fees for the international competition go towards Random Acts, and in 2012, GISHWHES broke the world record for most pledges to perform an act of kindness.{{cite news|last=Hayes|first=Molly|title=Wanted: Rooster costume and Russian colonel|url=http://www.thespec.com/news-story/4029952-wanted-rooster-costume-and-russian-colonel/|accessdate=October 22, 2013|newspaper=[[The Hamilton Spectator]]|date=August 14, 2013}} ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role ! Notes |- | 1999 | ''[[Liberty Heights]]'' | Guy | Uncredited |- | 1999 | ''[[Girl, Interrupted (film)|Girl, Interrupted]]'' | Tony | |- | 2003 | ''[[Finding Home]]'' | Dave | |- | 2006 | ''[[Karla (film)|Karla]]'' | [[Paul Bernardo]] | |- | 2008 | ''[[Loot (2008 film)|Loot]]'' | Associate Producer[http://www.hbo.com/documentaries/loot Loot: Home]. HBO. Retrieved on March 1, 2011. | |- |} ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role ! Series Regular: Seasons 5–6, 9-present
Special Guest Star: Season 7 & 8
Director: Season 9, episode 17
